original_text: The Lord says this about Jezebel: “Dogs will eat Jezebel's dead body beside the city wall of Jezreel.”
korean_text: 이세벨에게 대하여도 여호와께서 말씀하여 이르시되 개들이 이스르엘 성읍 곁에서 이세벨을 먹을지라

sentences.original_text: The Lord says this about Jezebel:
Dogs will eat Jezebel's dead body
beside the city wall of Jezreel.
